tool_description: Collects and standardizes quality control measurement data from various laboratory instruments and manual entries.

test_name.description: Name of the laboratory test performed

control_level.description: Control material level (low, normal, high, critical)

measurement_unit.description: Unit of measurement for the result

error_messages: Invalid measurement value: measured_value must be a valid number.
Invalid control level: control_level must be one of [low, normal, high, critical].
Invalid timestamp: collection_time must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time format.
Missing required data: All required fields must be provided and non-empty.
Duplicate entry: A QC measurement with these parameters already exists for this time period.
Future timestamp: collection_time cannot be in the future.
usage: Provide instrument details, test information, measurement data, and timing information. The tool standardizes and stores QC data for analysis and trending.

record_id.description: Unique identifier for the QC data record

normalized_value.description: Measurement value normalized to standard units

data_quality_score.description: Quality score for the collected data (0-100)
